### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (5.0, -73.0))

### Electricity generator at position (-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position (-18.5, 19.5))
- Boiler (position (-13.5, 20.0))
- Offshore pump (position (-11.5, 26.5))
- Small electric poles (positions (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-15.5, 19.5), (-19.5, 22.5))

### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (-17.5, 23.5))

### Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position (-21.5, 25.5))

### Pipe groups
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup (fluid system 41235, position (-18.5, 16.5))
- PipeGroup (fluid system 41238, position (-12.5, 21.5))
- PipeGroup (fluid system 41241, position (-9.5, 21.5))
- PipeGroup (fluid system 41246, position (-10.5, 22.5))
- PipeGroup (fluid system 41247, position (-6.5, 23.5))

### Electricity group
Consists of the following entities:
- ElectricityGroup (id 213281, poles at positions (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-16.5, 18.5), (-15.5, 20.5), (-19.5, 22.5))

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract items from entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the item you wish to extract. In this case, the stone furnace at (5.0, -73.0) did not contain copper plates.

### Errors when accessing attributes of objects
- Verify that the object you are trying to access has the attribute you are referencing. The error with the `ElectricityGroup` indicates that the `electrical_id` attribute does not exist. Check the object structure to confirm available attributes before usage.
